snippet.title: CyberWar - Fight To The Last Man | Unreal Engine 4 | Sci-fi | Alpha
snippet.description:
Game Title: Cyber War - Fight To The Last Man
Hi Everyone, I need some advice and guidance related to my game CyberWar. I've decided to launch a test game server for those who want to play CyberWar. 
CyberWar is a multiplayer online game, playable on PC. The focus is on player vs. player gameplay with each player piloting a battle hovercraft. The objective is to destroy enemy troops and complete the mission either by destroying all vessels of the opposing team or capturing the enemy team's base. The player takes control of a single hovercraft of his choice, and enters the battle on a random map. The player has control over the hover's movement, firing, and can communicate with allied players via the text chat. The goal is to survive and save the human race from extinction by breaching into the heart of the enemy's defense, while contending with traps, drones, robots. Let's Go to Battle...

• Platform: PC
• Genre: Action Game, Shooter
• Multiplayer: Multiplayer Online Game
• Camera View: Third Person 
• Game Engine: Unreal Engine 4
• Team: Indie Game
• Play for Free: Alpha

http://www.sync3d.com
https://discord.gg/52xgjNw

How to apply:
1. Click register and fill all the necessary fields
2. You will receive a confirmation message on your e-mail. Please note that the e-mail of your account has to be verified.
3. Now you only have to conform and download the game client to Play
